fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your target will be sent the attached gif
-Sphering someone will trap them in a sphere, roleblocking them. All town visits one them will fail, but evils are smart enough to notice an opening so they can still use their ability.
-You can’t die, because the town is unable to hang or kill spheres.
-You’re immune to role-related modkills
-You can’t be roleblocked either.
-Anyone visiting you will be trapped in a sphere the next night, and will be sent the attached gif.
-You die if Nlove (42) visits you. This role doesn’t have to exist for Spherical John Proctor Spinning to spawn.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Cause a heal to fail the same night your target is attacked 3 times **OR** make any current good factions lose
